TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_WinningInvestment.name: Minor Gambit
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_WinningInvestment.description: If you win your next player combat, gain 3 gold.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_RentedGloves.name: Phantom Gloves
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_RentedGloves.description: Gain a temporary Thief's Gloves for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_IncomingClass.name: All Ones
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_IncomingClass.description: Reroll your Shop with all 1-cost champions.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Batnap.name: Copycat
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Batnap.description: Next combat: Get a 1-star copy of the first enemy champion to die.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_ShareTheWealth.name: Truce
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_ShareTheWealth.description: You and your opponent gain 1 gold.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_GearSwap.name: Gear Swap
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_GearSwap.description: Gain a temporary Magnetic Remover and a Reforger for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_BusyBees.name: Busy Bees
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_BusyBees.description: Your Bees gain 25% Attack Speed this round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_XerathZap_TheEmperor.name: The Emperor
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_XerathZap_TheEmperor.description: Next combat: Xerath gains 20% Damage Amp and his allies gain 10% Damage Amp.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_XerathZap_TheSun.name: The Sun
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_XerathZap_TheSun.description: Gain a Support anvil and an Artifact anvil.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_ComfortFood.name: Comfort Food
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_ComfortFood.description: Gain 1 player health. Gain 2 more if you lose next player combat.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_AllTwos.name: All Twos
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_AllTwos.description: Reroll your Shop with all 2-cost champions.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_AllThrees.name: All Threes
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_AllThrees.description: Reroll your Shop with all 3-cost champions.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_AllFours.name: All Fours
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_AllFours.description: Reroll your Shop with all 4-cost champions.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_AllFives.name: All Fives
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_AllFives.description: Reroll your Shop with all 5-cost champions.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Enhance.name: Enhance
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Enhance.description: Reroll your Shop with champions 1 cost higher.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_SinisterDeal.name: Sinister Deal
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_SinisterDeal.description: Gain 2 gold. This Charm costs 1 player health.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Premonition.name: Crystal Ball
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Premonition.description: Reveal who your next opponent is.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_EscalatingHeal.name: Train Hard
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_EscalatingHeal.description: Gain 1 Health for each Train Hard you have bought this game.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_AncientRitual.name: Eldritch Hunger
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_AncientRitual.description: Next combat: Your Eldritch God gains 20% %i:scaleAS% and 10% %i:scaleHealth% on takedown.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Quickening.name: Quickening
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Quickening.description: Next combat: Chrono champions gain +30% %i:scaleAS% after countdown.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_SnapFreeze.name: Frosty Fortitude
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_SnapFreeze.description: Next combat: Winter ice soldiers gain 40% more Health.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_HailToTheQueen.name: Queen's Gambit
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_HailToTheQueen.description: Next combat: If you win, gain a copy of your highest cost Faerie.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_QuickBurn.name: Spitfire
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_QuickBurn.description: Next combat: Dragon attacks deal an extra 1% max Health true damage.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_HocusPocus.name: Hocus Pocus
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_HocusPocus.description: Next combat: Witches gain 25 Ability Power.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Distraction.name: Summon Dummy
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Distraction.description: Gain a Target Dummy for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_MinorShield.name: Starless Shield
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_MinorShield.description: Next combat: Grant 300 Shield to your 1-star champions.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_LightningStrike.name: Lightning Strike
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_LightningStrike.description: Next combat: Deal 10% max Health as true damage to all enemies.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Earthquake.name: Earthquake
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Earthquake.description: Next combat: Stun all enemies for 2 seconds.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_CoinFlip.name: Coin Flip
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_CoinFlip.description: 50% chance to gain 1 gold for each Coin Flip you've used.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_TheCount.name: The Count
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_TheCount.description: Reroll your Shop with a 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 cost champion.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Dehance.name: Dehance
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Dehance.description: Reroll your Shop with champions 1 cost lower.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_EscalatingXP.name: Study Hard
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_EscalatingXP.description: Gain 2 XP for each Study Hard you've bought this game.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_LesserDuplication.name: Magic Mirror
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_LesserDuplication.description: Gain a 1-star copy of a random champion you fielded last combat.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_RunRun.name: Rite of Speed
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_RunRun.description: Your team gains 10% Attack Speed for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_DressDown.name: Dress Down
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_DressDown.description: Next combat: 30% Shred and Sunder all enemies for 8 seconds.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_SilverFighting.name: Silver Guard
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_SilverFighting.description: Next combat start: Your team is immune to crowd control for 8 seconds.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Salvager.name: Salvager
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Salvager.description: Any champions you bench this turn have items removed and broken apart.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_ShieldWall.name: Shield Wall
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_ShieldWall.description: Next combat: Your team gains 10 Armor.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_FireFire.name: Sunfire Sorcery
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_FireFire.description: Next combat: Burn and Wound enemies for 10 seconds.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Stealthy.name: Stealthy
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Stealthy.description: Next combat: 3 units in your back row are untargetable for 8 seconds.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Leadership.name: Leadership
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Leadership.description: A champion holding 3 completed items gains 300 Health permanently.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_MagicWall.name: Phantom Claw
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_MagicWall.description: Gain 1 temporary Dragon's Claw for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Lifeline.name: Lucky Find
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Lifeline.description: Gain 1 gold. Your team gains 50 Health for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Golem.name: Summon Sentinel
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Golem.description: Summon a Sentinel with an emblem of your most active trait for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_UltraBuggy.name: Spawn Swarm
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_UltraBuggy.description: Next combat: Your 1st 2 front row units spawn a voidling after death.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Scrappy.name: Scrappy
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Scrappy.description: 2 champions without items gain a temporary full item.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Blessing.name: Radiantize
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Blessing.description: 1 full item held by a champion becomes Radiant for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_PureUtility.name: Pure Utility
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_PureUtility.description: Next combat: Shred, Sunder, Wound, and Burn all enemies for 15 seconds.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Desperation.name: Sinister Shop
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Desperation.description: Gain 6 Shop rerolls. This Charm costs 4 player health.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_XerathZap_Judgement.name: Judgement
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_XerathZap_Judgement.description: Next combat: If you win, gain 12 gold; if you lose, gain 20 XP.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_XerathZap_TheStar.name: The Star
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_XerathZap_TheStar.description: Next combat: 1-stars star up. Their allies gain 200 Shield and 20 %i:scaleAP%.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_StickyFingers.name: Sticky Fingers
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_StickyFingers.description: Next combat: copy a component from the 1st enemy your team kills.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Tinker.name: Tinker
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Tinker.description: Gain a Reforger and a Remover.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_CombatMastery.name: Combat Mastery
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_CombatMastery.description: Next combat: Gain 1 XP for each enemy your team kills.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_DieRoll.name: Die Roll
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_DieRoll.description: Roll a die. Gain gold equal to the result.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_SupremeArcana.name: Supreme Arcana
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_SupremeArcana.description: Your High Arcana champion gains 20% Damage Amp and Durability for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_PieceOfCake.name: Piece of Cake
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_PieceOfCake.description: Gain 25 sugar for your Sugarcraft cake.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_RentedBramble.name: Phantom Vest
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_RentedBramble.description: Gain a temporary Bramble Vest for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_XerathZap_TheTower.name: The Tower
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_XerathZap_TheTower.description: Gain a Lightning Dummy for 1 round that strikes nearby enemies.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_XerathZap_TheWorld.name: The World
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_XerathZap_TheWorld.description: Gain a copy of every 4-cost champion.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_XerathZap_TheLovers.name: The Lovers
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_XerathZap_TheLovers.description: Gain a 5-cost champion and a 2* 2-cost champion that share traits.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_XerathZap_TheMagician.name: The Magician
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_XerathZap_TheMagician.description: Reroll your shop with all Charms. You can buy 1 this round, which casts twice.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_XerathZap_TheChariot.name: The Chariot
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_XerathZap_TheChariot.description: This round, rerolls cost you 1 gold and buying XP costs you 3 gold.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_GreedyDilemma.name: Greedy Dilemma
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_GreedyDilemma.description: Next combat: Gain 1 gold. If your opponent also bought this, lose 2 player health instead.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_MajorGambit.name: Major Gambit
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_MajorGambit.description: If you win your next player combat, gain 10 gold.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_LifeInsurance.name: Life Insurance
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_LifeInsurance.description: Next combat: Allied champions have a 50% chance to drop 1 gold on death.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_MinorPolymorph.name: Minor Polymorph
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_MinorPolymorph.description: Non-combat: A 1-cost champ you have transforms into a 2-cost.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Polymorph.name: Polymorph
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Polymorph.description: Non-combat: A 2-cost champ you have transforms into a 3-cost.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_MajorPolymorph.name: Major Polymorph
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_MajorPolymorph.description: Non-combat: A 4-cost champ you have transforms into a 5-cost.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_BackrowStar.name: Backrow Star
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_BackrowStar.description: Next combat: A random back row champion gains 40% %i:scaleAS% for 7 seconds.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_DesperatePlea.name: Desperate Plea
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_DesperatePlea.description: Next combat: Reduce incoming player damage by 80%.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_PhantomEmblem.name: Phantom Emblem
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_PhantomEmblem.description: Gain a temporary emblem of your most active trait for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Aftershock.name: Aftershock
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Aftershock.description: Next Combat: After 10 seconds, stun all enemies for 1.5 seconds.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Rushdown.name: Rushdown
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Rushdown.description: Your highest %i:scaleAS% champion gains 120% decaying %i:scaleAS% over 5 sec for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_ScopedWeapons.name: Scope Expansion
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_ScopedWeapons.description: Champions in your back 2 rows gain 2 Attack Range for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_UltraAscension.name: Ultra Ascension
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_UltraAscension.description: Next combat: At 22 seconds, your team gains 300% Damage Amp.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_IroncladSpirit.name: Ironclad Spirit
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_IroncladSpirit.description: Your team gains 30 Armor for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_MysticSpirit.name: Mystic Spirit
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_MysticSpirit.description: Your team gains 30 Magic Resist for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Assembly.name: Assembly
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Assembly.description: Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_LateBloomer.name: Late Bloomer
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_LateBloomer.description: Gain a permanent 3-star 1-cost champion and a Magnetic Remover.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Zoomify.name: Zoomify
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Zoomify.description: Your team gains 200% movement speed for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_GuildOfThieves.name: Guild of Thieves
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_GuildOfThieves.description: Gain 3 temporary Thief's Gloves for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Hugify.name: Hugify
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Hugify.description: Your highest %i:scaleHealth% champion grows, gaining 500 %i:scaleHealth% for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_ShopGlitch.name: Animate Shop
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_ShopGlitch.description: For 20 seconds, your shop refreshes for free every 2 seconds.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_QuickBounty.name: Quick Bounty
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_QuickBounty.description: Next combat: Gain an item component if you win in under 15 seconds.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_SummonDragon.name: Summon Dragon
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_SummonDragon.description: Summon a 3200 Health Dragon for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_CloakOfSurprise.name: Surprise!
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_CloakOfSurprise.description: 1 champion without items gains a Suspicious Trenchcoat for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_CloakOfBigSurprise.name: Big Surprise!
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_CloakOfBigSurprise.description: 2 champions without items gain a Suspicious Trenchcoat for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_TreasureHunter.name: Treasure Hunter
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_TreasureHunter.description: 1 champion without items gain an Unstable Treasure Chest for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_TreasureParty.name: Treasure Party
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_TreasureParty.description: 1 champions without items gain 2 Unstable Treasure Chests for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Shrinkify.name: Shrinkify
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Shrinkify.description: Your highest %i:scaleAS% champion shrinks, gaining 25% %i:scaleAS% for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Manaflow.name: Manaflow
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Manaflow.description: Your highest %i:scaleMana% champion's Mana cost is reduced by 20 %i:scaleMana% for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_MoonlightRitual.name: Moonlight Ritual
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_MoonlightRitual.description: Next combat: A random 1 or 2 cost champion stars up.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Assassin.name: Assassin
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Assassin.description: Next combat: Your highest %i:scaleAD% champion jumps to the enemy backline.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Paragon.name: Paragon
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Paragon.description: Next combat: Your team's physical damage is dealt as magic damage

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Discount.name: Discount
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Discount.description: This round, the next champion you buy is free.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Shivify.name: Shivinate
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Shivify.description: All your items transform into Statikk Shiv for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_YordleSpirit.name: Yordle Spirit
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_YordleSpirit.description: Next combat: Your team has a 99% chance to dodge attacks for 4 seconds.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_MagnumOpus.name: Magnum Opus
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_MagnumOpus.description: Lose 66 player health. Gain a permanent 3-star 5-cost.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Hexplosion.name: Hexplosion
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Hexplosion.description: Next combat: The first ally champion to die explodes, dealing 600 magic damage.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_PhantomArtifact.name: Phantom Artifact
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_PhantomArtifact.description: Gain a temporary Artifact for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_GiantGlamour.name: Bunch-o'-Belts
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_GiantGlamour.description: Your team gains 6 non-removable Giant's Belts for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_GoldenBlessing.name: Golden Dummy
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_GoldenBlessing.description: Gain a Dummy for 1 round. Your Dummies drop gold as they take damage.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_GoldenArmor.name: Golden Armor
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_GoldenArmor.description: Your team gains 50 %i:scaleHealth% for every 10 gold you have for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_AnimateBench.name: Animate Bench
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_AnimateBench.description: Next combat: Every 6 seconds, a champion joins combat from your bench.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Wish/TFT12_Zap_Wish.name: Minor Wish
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Wish/TFT12_Zap_Wish.description: Wished for 2 units to gain 500 Health for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Wish/TFT12_Zap_Wish.name: Minor Wish
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Wish/TFT12_Zap_Wish.description: Wished for a temporary item for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_BigWish/TFT12_Zap_B.name: Major Wish
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_BigWish/TFT12_Zap_B.description: Wished for 5 units to gain 500 Health for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_BigWish/TFT12_Zap_B.name: Major Wish
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_BigWish/TFT12_Zap_B.description: Wished for a temporary Support item for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Tremors.name: Tremors
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Tremors.description: Combat start and every 10 seconds, stun all enemies for 1.25 seconds.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Barrier.name: Barrier
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Barrier.description: Next combat: Your team gains 1000 Shield, decaying over 5 seconds.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Counterspell.name: Counterspell
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Counterspell.description: Next combat: Mana Reave all enemies.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_MeteorStorm.name: Meteor Storm
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_MeteorStorm.description: Combat start: Burn and deal 30% max Health magic damage to 4 enemies.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Infliction.name: Infliction
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Infliction.description: Next combat: Chill, Burn, Shred, and Sunder enemies for 8 seconds.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_SummonGolem.name: Summon Golem
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_SummonGolem.description: Summon a large Golem equipped with defensive items for 1 round.

TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Poof.name: Reaper
TFT12_Zaps/TFT12_Zap_Poof.description: Next combat: Your units execute enemies that fall below 200 Health.
